instruction: Brainstorm 3 creative marketing strategies for a small business
output:
1. Leverage influencer marketing - partner with micro-influencers in the industry who have an engaged and loyal following.
2. Utilize social media and content marketing - use social media platforms and run creative campaigns to attract customer attention and spread the word about your business.
3. Implement a referral program - reward existing customers for referring new customers to your business.
